targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(pr_lead_time) AS "Average lead time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date)) AS pr_lead_time,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date))) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE  $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))    
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      ) AS lead_times
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Lead Time (from the first commit to pull request merge), excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.description: From the first commit to PR raised

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(from_commit_to_raise) AS "Average lead time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)),0) AS from_commit_to_raise,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)),0)) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      ) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Development time, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(time_to_first_response) 
FROM (
    SELECT
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_response_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0) AS time_to_first_response,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_response_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0)) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                shared_for_review_date,
                MIN(LEAST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date),
                    COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, prtcpnt.first_approval_date))) AS first_response_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                    INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                    INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
                    INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
            WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
                    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
                    AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                    AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
                    AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
            GROUP BY pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.shared_for_review_date
            HAVING MIN(LEAST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date),
                    COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, prtcpnt.first_approval_date))) IS NOT NULL
        ) AS "First responses") AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Time to first reaction, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.description: Time from the first reaction to PR merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(rework_time)
FROM (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-first_response_date)) AS rework_time,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-first_response_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                merged_date,
                MIN(LEAST(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date)) as first_response_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
                INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
            WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
                AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
            GROUP BY pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.merged_date
            HAVING MIN(LEAST(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date)) IS NOT NULL
        ) AS response_timings
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Rework time, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.description: Time from last approve to PR merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(from_last_approve_to_merge)
FROM (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_approval_date)) AS from_last_approve_to_merge,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_approval_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                merged_date,
                MAX(prtcpnt.last_approval_date) as last_approval_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
                INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
            WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
                AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
            GROUP BY pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.merged_date
            HAVING MAX(prtcpnt.last_approval_date) IS NOT NULL
        ) AS approvals
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

panels.title: Idle between pull request approval and merge, excluding outliers ($percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(pr_lead_time) AS "Average lead time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      shared_for_review_date,
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date)) AS pr_lead_time,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-initial_commit_date))) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))    
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      ) AS lead_times
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(from_commit_to_raise) AS "Development time"
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      shared_for_review_date,
      GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)),0) AS from_commit_to_raise,
      PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date))) AS value_rank
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))    
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      ) AS lead_times
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(time_to_first_response) AS "Time to first reaction" 
FROM (
    SELECT
        shared_for_review_date,
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_response_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0) AS time_to_first_response,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_response_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0)) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                shared_for_review_date,
                MIN(LEAST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date),
                    COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, prtcpnt.first_approval_date))) AS first_response_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
                INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
            WHERE (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
            GROUP BY pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.shared_for_review_date
            HAVING MIN(LEAST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date),
                    COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, prtcpnt.first_approval_date))) IS NOT NULL
        ) AS "First responses") AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
$__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
AVG(rework_time) AS "Rework time"
FROM (
    SELECT
        shared_for_review_date,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-first_response_date)) AS rework_time,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-first_response_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                shared_for_review_date,
                merged_date,
                MIN(GREATEST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, pr.shared_for_review_date), COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, pr.shared_for_review_date))) as first_response_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
                INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
            WHERE (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
            GROUP BY pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.merged_date, pr.shared_for_review_date
            HAVING MIN(GREATEST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, pr.shared_for_review_date), COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, pr.shared_for_review_date))) IS NOT NULL
        ) AS response_timings
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
    $__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period), 
    AVG(from_last_approve_to_merge) AS "Idle after approve"
FROM (
    SELECT
        shared_for_review_date,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_approval_date)) AS from_last_approve_to_merge,
        PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_approval_date))) AS value_rank
    FROM (
            SELECT
                shared_for_review_date,
                merged_date,
                MAX(prtcpnt.last_approval_date) as last_approval_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
                INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
            WHERE (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
                AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
            GROUP BY pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.merged_date, pr.shared_for_review_date
            HAVING MAX(prtcpnt.last_approval_date) IS NOT NULL
        ) AS approvals
) AS timings
WHERE value_rank BETWEEN (0+$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude) AND (1-$percent_of_outliers_to_exclude)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT COUNT(*) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(reviewers_count) AS "Reviewers count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT avg(diff_size) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN tests_were_touched THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)::decimal/COUNT(*)*100 AS "PRs without tests touch" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT SUM(diff_size) as "Total diff"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT 
   $__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period),
   COUNT(*) AS "PRs count",
   AVG(reviewers_count) AS "Reviewers count",
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count",
   AVG(diff_size) AS "Diff size",
   SUM(CASE WHEN tests_were_touched THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)::decimal/COUNT(*)*100 AS "PRs without tests changes",
   SUM(diff_size) as "Lines changed"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period)

SELECT 
   CASE 
      WHEN participant.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former employee)') 
      WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
      ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
   END,
   COUNT(prtcpnt.pull_request_number) AS "Added as reviewer",
   SUM(CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_comment_date IS NULL AND prtcpnt.first_approval_date IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Did not comment",
   SUM(CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_approval_date IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Did not approve"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN pull_request_participant as prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user) 
   AND NOT author.is_former_employee 
GROUP BY participant.nickname, participant.is_bot_user, participant.is_former_employee, participant.login
ORDER BY "Added as reviewer" DESC

SELECT 
      CASE 
        WHEN participant.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former employee)') 
        WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
        ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
      END,
      AVG(prtcpnt.comments_count) AS "Average comments count",
      AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (LEAST(COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_approval_date, prtcpnt.first_comment_date), COALESCE(prtcpnt.first_comment_date, prtcpnt.first_approval_date))-shared_for_review_date))) AS "First reaction in"
FROM pull_request AS pr
  INNER JOIN pull_request_participant as prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
  INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
  INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
  AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
  AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
  AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
  AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
  AND NOT author.is_former_employee 
GROUP BY participant.nickname, participant.is_bot_user, participant.is_former_employee, participant.login
ORDER BY "First reaction in"

SELECT personal.repository_name, contributor_name, personal_contribution::numeric/total_contribution*100 as "contribution_percent"
FROM
    (SELECT 
        repository_name, 
        CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
        END AS contributor_name,
        SUM(diff_size) as personal_contribution
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY repository_name, author.nickname, author.is_former_employee, author.is_bot_user, author.login) AS personal

RIGHT JOIN 
    (SELECT repository_name, SUM(diff_size) as total_contribution
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY repository_name) AS total
ON total.repository_name=personal.repository_name
ORDER BY personal.repository_name

SELECT 
  grouping_field AS "$group_by_field",
  AVG((GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0))) AS "Development time",
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_response_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "First reaction got in",
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-first_response_date))) AS "Rework time",
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_approval_date))) AS "Idle after approve"
FROM (SELECT
        CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
          THEN
            CASE 
              WHEN participant.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former employee)') 
              WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
              ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
            END
          ELSE pr.repository_name 
        END as grouping_field,
        pr.merged_date,
        pr.shared_for_review_date,
        pr.initial_commit_date,
        MIN(LEAST(COALESCE(first_approval_date, first_comment_date),COALESCE(first_comment_date, first_approval_date))) AS first_response_date,
        MAX(last_approval_date) as last_approval_date
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
        INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
        INNER JOIN contributor as participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
      AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY 1, pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.merged_date, pr.shared_for_review_date, pr.initial_commit_date
) AS activity_stats
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY AVG((GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0)))
        +AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_response_date-shared_for_review_date)))
        +AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-first_response_date)))
        +AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_approval_date)))

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   COUNT(*) as "PRs count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "PRs count"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   SUM(diff_size) as "Total diff"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Total diff"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(diff_size) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Average PR size"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Approval speed"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(reviewers_count) AS "Reviewers count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Reviewers count"

SELECT 
   CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
      THEN
         CASE 
           WHEN author.is_former_employee THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former employee)') 
           WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
           ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
         END
      ELSE pr.repository_name 
   END as grouping_field,
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Comments count"

SELECT
   CASE
      WHEN diff_size<100 THEN 50 * round(diff_size / 50)
      WHEN diff_size<500 THEN 100 * round(diff_size / 100)
      ELSE 1000 * round(diff_size / 1000)
   END as "Diff size",
   AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Diff size"

SELECT
   reviewers_count  AS "Reviewers count",
    AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY reviewers_count
ORDER BY reviewers_count

SELECT
   CASE
      WHEN diff_size<100 THEN 20 * round(diff_size / 20)
      WHEN diff_size<500 THEN 100 * round(diff_size / 100)
      ELSE 1000 * round(diff_size / 1000)
   END as "Diff size",
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Diff size"

SELECT
   reviewers_count  AS "Reviewers count",
    AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY reviewers_count
ORDER BY reviewers_count

select pr.*, author.nickname, author.is_bot_user, author.is_former_employee
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN contributor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date)
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))   
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ('$include_bots_activities'='Yes' OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM pull_request
ORDER BY team_name
list.label: Team
list.name: team_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT team_name FROM pull_request
ORDER BY team_name

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM pull_request 
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR team_name IN ($team_name))    
ORDER BY repository_name
list.label: Repository name
list.name: repository_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM pull_request 
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR team_name IN ($team_name))    
ORDER BY repository_name

list.definition:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
contributor.id as __value, 
CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN contributor.login ELSE contributor.nickname END as __text 
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN contributor ON pull_request.author_id = contributor.id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
ORDER BY 2
list.label: PR author
list.name: pr_author
list.query:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
contributor.id as __value, 
CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN contributor.login ELSE contributor.nickname END as __text 
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN contributor ON pull_request.author_id = contributor.id
    WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
ORDER BY 2
